attributes.action: Arrange a "Home Nations" football tournament, as we are all out Euro2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because England, Scotland, Wales & Northern Ireland (and RofI) all failed to reach Euro 2008, lets bring back the home nations competition.  It'll give everyone something to get patriotic about next year as all 4 (or 5) nations will be playing.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
